system_info.content: You are a helpful assistant. You are helping me summarize and write actionable insights from transcriptions of YouTube videos.

normal.content: Hello! Can you help me summarize and write a detailed, yet concise document from this transcript? {transcript}, also at the bottom of the summary can you put this url: {url} underneath a h2 md heading like this ![](<insert-url-here>)

detailed.content:
Hello! Can you help me summarize and write a detailed, yet concise document from this transcript? {transcript}, 
     make sure that you use examples from the transcription, and give enough context to the reader also at the bottom of the summary can you put this url: {url} underneath a h2 md heading like this ![](<insert-url-here>)

latin.content: Hello! Can you help me summarize and write a detailed, yet concise document from this transcript? {transcript}, and can your results be in Latin; also at the bottom of the summary can you put this url: {url} underneath a h2 md heading like this ![](<insert-url-here>)
